pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimates Growth Parameters from Models and Plots the Curve // Fit growth curves to various known microbial growth models automatically to estimate growth parameters. Growth curves can be plotted with their uncertainty band. Growth models are: modified Gompertz model (Zwietering et al. (1990) doi:10.1128/aem.56.6.1875-1881.1990), Baranyi model (Baranyi and Roberts (1994) doi:10.1016/0168-1605%2894%2990157-0), Rosso model (Rosso et al. (1993) doi:10.1006/jtbi.1993.1099) and linear model (Dantigny (2005) doi:10.1016/j.ijfoodmicro.2004.10.013).
